sentence.Network_en: Among assertive, learned, or eloquent people, she seemed to feel her dowdiness and insufficiency.
sentence.Network_cn: 在这群过分自信, 学识渊博, 伶牙俐齿的人中间, 她总仿佛觉得自己过于懒散,笨头笨脑的.

list.abs: He had a dowdy wife and several children ., 他有一个相貌平平的妻子和几个孩子.
dowdily 懒散地dowdy 衣衫褴褛的dowel 木钉
He had a dowdy wife and several children ., 他有一个相貌平平的妻子和几个孩子.
she made several attempts to find other employment , but her dowdy appearance made her look old and inefficient .她找了几次工作，但是她邋遢的外表使她看起来又老又没用。
